CustomField.formula: CASE( Account_Metrics_Badge_Item_Count__c ,5,IMAGE("https://c.na29.content.force.com/servlet/servlet.FileDownload?file=015340000024Asv", "Account Apprentice"), 6,IMAGE("https://c.na29.content.force.com/servlet/servlet.FileDownload?file=015340000024Asv", "Account Apprentice"), 7,IMAGE("https://c.na29.content.force.com/servlet/servlet.FileDownload?file=015340000024At0", "Account Rockstar" ), 8,IMAGE("https://c.na29.content.force.com/servlet/servlet.FileDownload?file=015340000024At0", "Account Rockstar" ), 9,IMAGE("https://c.na29.content.force.com/servlet/servlet.FileDownload?file=015340000024At5", "Account Wizard" ), 10,IMAGE("https://c.na29.content.force.com/servlet/servlet.FileDownload?file=015340000024At5", "Account Wizard" ),"Just Getting Started")
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Badges are earned by checklist items that are added after July 1, 2015. If a badge is displayed in Salesforce and no name is present in Awarded To field, the badge was earned prior to July 1, 2015.
CustomField.label: Account Metrics Badge Status
